name: 4FT Olympic Barbell for Weightlifting and Power Lifting,2 Inch Strength Training Weight Bar with Weightlifting gloves for Squat, Deadlifts, Bench Press, Hip Thrusts, Curl, Overhead Press,500LB Capacity
short_description: Premium Quality Barbell Bar:Barbell bar crafted from high-strength #45 alloy steel with a durable oxide finish. Barbell weighs 20 lb and boasts a tensile strength of up to 87000 PSI,500LB weight capacity and corrosion-resistant coating,it withstands intense daily training while maintaining its sleek appearance.

Optimized Grip & Control:4FT Barbell Bar features 1.5mm medium-depth diamond knurling that provides secure grip during lifts without tearing your hands.The 25mm shaft diameter ensures easy to hold and comfortable, one knurl mark at both side helps to place your hands at correct positions,making it ideal for squats, deadlifts, and bench presses while including protective gloves for wrist safety.

High-quality Bearing and Bushing:NouraVita Olympic barbell advanced needle bearings and brass bushings providing enhanced friction reduction and catering to the demands of swift weightlifting rotations.Compatible with all 2" Olympic plates,each sleeve end is equipped with snap rings, ensuring stable port positioning.

Versatile for Various Workouts:48" Weight bar can meet all your training needs, such as Olympic weightlifting, powerlifting training,strength exercises and cross-training.Movements like bicep curls,deadlifts,overhead presses,bench presses and squats are all effortless. Suitable for athletes of professional size and level, and can be used at home to build muscle and relieve stress.A great addition and choice for your weight room and home gym.

Buy with Confidence:We trust the durability and strength of our barbell bar so much that we provide 2 year warranty,and we always stand by the quality of our products and offer excellent customer service you expect. Just buy with confidence!

name: PROOFGOLD 6.6ft/7ft Olympic Barbell Bar 35Lb(15kg)/45LB(20kg) Barbell,Bench Press Bar for Squats and Deadlifts,Olympic Weight Bar for Home Gym,Womens Mens barbell(2inch),500LB/700LB/1000LB
short_description: 【INCREDIBLE VALUE】Our aim was to design an Olympic bar that would satisfy every customer at an affordable price. And we succeeded! We enhanced the surface treatment to make our bar more robust for repeated use. The high-grade steel utilized in this rose red barbell was tested to have a tensile strength of 190,000 PSI, which is sufficient to handle all your requirements. Moreover, it has an astonishing appearance and a wonderful feel with an overall rose red e-coat finish.

【SUPERIOR SPECS】The Olympic bar is 79.13 inches (6.6ft) in length, has weighs 35 lbs(15 kg), features a 25mm grip diameter. The length of the sleeve that can be loaded is 13 inches, suitable for a 2-inch barbell. Our Olympic barbell can bear a weight capacity of 500 lbs and possesses the characteristics of high load-bearing capacity and flexibility.

【KNURLED HANDLES DESIGN WITH DUAL MARKS】 The 25 mm grip shaft has a 1.2 mm medium-level knurling. A Peaked Diamond Knurl pattern offers an excellent gripping surface without the sharpness of other grips and has a moderate whip, increasing friction and enhancing the grip experience. The knurling design can also effectively reduce the tension in the wrist and forearm, increase the safety of sports and ensure comfort.

【NEEDLE BEARING & SLEEVES】 The sleeves of our barbell bar are friction welded, which is stronger than normal welding sleeves. Each of the rotating sleeves has 2 needle bearings and one bushing, totaling 4 needle bearings in the bar. Bushings provide a comprehensive smooth spin, while bearings are designed to spin fast and meet the catching needs of the snatch and clean & jerk.

【MULTIPLE USAGE WEIGHTING BAR】 The Capacity Olympic Bar can fulfill all your needs for strength training. It is ideal for taking your training to the next level in Olympic lifting, cross training and powerlifting, such as squatting, deadlifting, and bench pressing. Get a full body explosive workout or target specific muscle groups to build mass and strength!
